long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make VggL exactly how you like it. Improve the chatting experience with an overhauled emote menu, steal your favorite emotes and learn how to animate them just by clicking on them in chat. Many more features are planned, including emote previews and appearance settings. Please provide your suggestions on Github @VowshApp!
